data.name: Tactical Operations Force
data.detailed_description:
Tactical Operations Force - TOF is a Third Person Shooter Game that allow players to play up to 10 vs 10 matches over the internet on Steam.
Main Game features are:

Multiplayer System
LAN Multiplayer System
Single Player

Players are able to buy weapons with gamecoins that are obtained playing the game. The game have 4 different modes:
Conquest
Rush
Team DeathMatch
DeathMatch

Game is under development and currently we are in Beta Stage, we are going to include more weapons, customization options and more maps in the near future.

data.short_description: Tactical Operations Force - TOF is a Third Person Shooter Game that allow players to play up to 10 vs 10 matches over the internet on Steam.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2200G / Intel Core-i5 10400
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 / Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 / Intel Core-i5 10600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5700 XT/ Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default integrated sound

content_descriptors.notes:
Game contains violence and some blood. Shooter game.
Game does not contain sexual or drug abuse.
